trans-unit.source: If true, disables printing to standard output in an exported build.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则禁用在导出的版本中打印到标准输出。

trans-unit.source: If true, disables the button at index button_idx in column column.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则禁用列 column 的索引 button_idx 处的按钮。

trans-unit.source: If true, disables the given shape owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则禁用给定的形状所有者。

trans-unit.source: If true, displays getters and setters in autocompletion results in the script editor. This setting is meant to be used when porting old projects (Godot 2), as using member variables is the preferred style from Godot 3 onwards.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在脚本编辑器中以自动完成结果显示getter和setter。该设置是在移植旧项目（Godot 2）时使用的，因为使用成员变量是Godot 3以后的首选样式。

trans-unit.source: If true, distance field hint is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用距离字段提示。

trans-unit.source: If true, draw the panel’s center. Else, only draw the 9-slice’s borders. Default value: true
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则绘制面板的中心。否则，仅绘制9切片的边界。默认值： true

trans-unit.source: If true, draw the panel's center. Else, only draw the 9-slice's borders.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则绘制面板的中心。否则，仅绘制9切片的边界。

trans-unit.source: If true, draws the camera’s drag margin rectangle in the editor. Default value: false
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在编辑器中绘制相机的拖动边距矩形。默认值： false

trans-unit.source: If true, draws the camera’s limits rectangle in the editor. Default value: true
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在编辑器中绘制摄像机的极限矩形。默认值： true

trans-unit.source: If true, draws the camera’s screen rectangle in the editor. Default value: false
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在编辑器中绘制摄像机的屏幕矩形。默认值： false

trans-unit.source: If true, draws the camera's drag margin rectangle in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在编辑器中绘制摄像机的拖动边距矩形。

trans-unit.source: If true, draws the camera's limits rectangle in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在编辑器中绘制摄像机的极限矩形。

trans-unit.source: If true, draws the camera's screen rectangle in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在编辑器中绘制摄像机的屏幕矩形。

trans-unit.source: If true, elements in ParallaxLayer child aren’t affected by the zoom level of the camera.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则ParallaxLayer子级中的元素不受照相机缩放级别的影响。

trans-unit.source: If true, elements in ParallaxLayer child aren't affected by the zoom level of the camera.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则ParallaxLayer子级中的元素不受照相机缩放级别的影响。

trans-unit.source: If true, enable spritesheet-based animation features when assigned to Particles2D and CPUParticles2D nodes. The ParticlesMaterial.anim_speed or CPUParticles2D.anim_speed should also be set to a positive value for the animation to play.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在分配给Particles2D和CPUParticles2D节点时启用基于spritesheet的动画功能。还应将ParticlesMaterial.anim_speed或CPUParticles2D.anim_speed设置为正值以播放动画。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables box projection. This makes reflections look more correct in rectangle-shaped rooms by offsetting the reflection center depending on the camera's location.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用框投影。通过根据相机的位置偏移反射中心，可以使矩形房间的反射看起来更正确。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables disconnection of existing connections in the GraphEdit by dragging the right end.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则通过拖动右端启用GraphEdit中现有连接的断开连接。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables distraction-free mode which hides side docks to increase the space available for the main view.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用无干扰模式，该模式将隐藏侧坞以增加主视图的可用空间。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables horizontal scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用水平滚动。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables low-processor usage mode. This setting only works on desktop platforms. The screen is not redrawn if nothing changes visually. This is meant for writing applications and editors, but is pretty useless (and can hurt performance) in most games.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用低处理器使用模式。此设置仅适用于台式机平台。如果视觉上没有任何变化，则不会重画屏幕。这是为编写应用程序和编辑器而设计的，但是在大多数游戏中却毫无用处（并且可能会损害性能）。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables selecting a tab with right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则可以使用鼠标右键选择一个选项卡。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables selecting a tab with the right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则可以使用鼠标右键选择一个选项卡。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables snapping.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用捕捉。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables specific GDScript warnings (see debug/gdscript/warnings/* settings). If false, disables all GDScript warnings.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用特定的GDScript警告（请参阅 debug/gdscript/warnings/* 设置）。如果为 false ，则禁用所有GDScript警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables text wrapping when it goes beyond the edge of what is visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则当超出可见范围时启用文本换行。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the "shadow to opacity" render mode where lighting modifies the alpha so shadowed areas are opaque and non-shadowed areas are transparent. Useful for overlaying shadows onto a camera feed in AR.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用“阴影到不透明”渲染模式，在该模式下，灯光会修改Alpha，因此阴影区域是不透明的，非阴影区域是透明的。用于将阴影叠加到AR中的相机源上。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the adjustment_* properties provided by this resource. If false, modifications to the adjustment_* properties will have no effect on the rendered scene.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用此资源提供的 adjustment_* 属性。如果为 false ，则对 adjustment_* 属性的修改将不会对渲染的场景产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the depth-of-field far blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用景深远模糊效果。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the depth-of-field near blur effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用景深接近模糊效果。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the detail overlay. Detail is a second texture that gets mixed over the surface of the object based on detail_mask. This can be used to add variation to objects, or to blend between two different albedo/normal textures.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用详细信息覆盖。细节是基于detail_mask在对象表面上混合的第二个纹理。这可用于为对象添加变化，或在两个不同的反照率/法线纹理之间混合。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the specified Feature. Many features that are available in SpatialMaterials need to be enabled before use. This way the cost for using the feature is only incurred when specified. Features can also be enabled by setting the corresponding member to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用指定的Feature。在使用之前，需要启用 SpatialMaterial 中可用的许多功能。这样，仅在指定时才产生使用功能的成本。也可以通过将相应的成员设置为 true 来启用功能。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the specified flag.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用指定的标志。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the specified flag. Flags are optional behaviour that can be turned on and off. Only one flag can be enabled at a time with this function, the flag enumerators cannot be bit-masked together to enable or disable multiple flags at once. Flags can also be enabled by setting the corresponding member to true. See Flags enumerator for options.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用指定的标志。标志是可以打开和关闭的可选行为。使用此功能一次只能启用一个标志，不能将这些标志枚举器位屏蔽在一起以一次启用或禁用多个标志。也可以通过将相应的成员设置为 true 来启用标志。有关选项，请参见标志枚举器。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the specified flag. See Flags for options.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用指定的标志。有关选项，请参见标志。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the tonemapping auto exposure mode of the scene renderer. If true, the renderer will automatically determine the exposure setting to adapt to the scene's illumination and the observed light.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用场景渲染器的色调映射自动曝光模式。如果为 true ，则渲染器将自动确定曝光设置以适应场景的照明和观察到的光线。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables the vertex grow setting. See params_grow_amount.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用顶点增长设置。参见params_grow_amount。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables vertical scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用垂直滚动。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables vertical synchronization. This eliminates tearing that may appear in moving scenes, at the cost of higher input latency and stuttering at lower framerates. If false, vertical synchronization will be disabled, however, many platforms will enforce it regardless (such as mobile platforms and HTML5).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用垂直同步。这样可以消除在运动场景中可能出现的撕裂现象，其代价是输入等待时间更长，帧速率更低。如果为 false ，则将禁用垂直同步，但是无论如何，许多平台都会强制执行垂直同步（例如移动平台和HTML5）。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a constant is used as a function.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在将常量用作函数时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a function assigned to a variable may yield and return a function state instead of a value.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在分配给变量的函数可能产生并返回函数状态而不是值时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a function is declared with the same name as a constant.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用与常量相同的名称声明函数时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a function is declared with the same name as a variable. This will turn into an error in a future version when first-class functions become supported in GDScript.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在声明与变量同名的函数时启用警告。当GDScript支持一流的功能时，在将来的版本中这将变成错误。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a function parameter is unused.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在未使用功能参数时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a local variable is unused.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在未使用局部变量时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a member variable is unused.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在未使用成员变量时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a signal is unused.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在未使用信号时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a ternary operator may emit values with incompatible types.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在三元运算符可能发出类型不兼容的值时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when a variable is declared with the same name as a function. This will turn into an error in a future version when first-class functions become supported in GDScript.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在声明与函数同名的变量时启用警告。当GDScript支持一流的功能时，在将来的版本中这将变成错误。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when accessing a property whose presence is not guaranteed at compile-time in the class.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在访问类中在编译时不能保证存在的属性时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when assigning a variable using an assignment operator like += if the variable wasn’t previously assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用 += 之类的赋值运算符来赋值变量时启用警告，前提是该变量先前未赋值。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when assigning a variable using an assignment operator like += if the variable wasn't previously assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用 += 之类的赋值运算符来赋值变量时启用警告，前提是该变量先前未赋值。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when assigning the result of a function that returns void to a variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在分配将 void 返回变量的函数结果时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when calling a function without using its return value (by assigning it to a variable or using it as a function argument). Such return values are sometimes used to denote possible errors using the Error enum.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在调用函数时启用警告，而不使用其返回值（通过将其分配给变量或将其用作函数参数）。此类返回值有时用于使用Error枚举表示可能的错误。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when calling a method whose presence is not guaranteed at compile-time in the class.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在调用类中在编译时不能保证存在的方法时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when calling a ternary expression that has no effect on the surrounding code, such as writing 42 if active else 0 as a statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在调用对周围代码没有影响的三元表达式时启用警告，例如， 42 if active else 0 写42，否则写0作为语句。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when calling an expression that has no effect on the surrounding code, such as writing 2 + 2 as a statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在调用对周围代码没有影响的表达式时启用警告，例如将 2 + 2 编写为语句。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when defining a local or subclass member variable that would shadow a variable at an upper level (such as a member variable).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在定义将在较高级别隐藏变量（例如成员变量）的局部或子类成员变量时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when deprecated keywords such as slave are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用已弃用的关键字（例如 slave )时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when dividing an integer by another integer (the decimal part will be discarded).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在将一个整数除以另一个整数时启用警告（小数部分将被丢弃）。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when passing a floating-point value to a function that expects an integer (it will be converted and lose precision).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在将浮点值传递给需要整数的函数时启用警告（它将被转换并失去精度）。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when performing an unsafe cast.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在执行不安全的投射时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when unreachable code is detected (such as after a return statement that will always be executed).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在检测到无法访问的代码时（例如将始终执行的 return 语句之后）启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when using a function as if it was a property.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在将函数用作属性时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when using a property as if it was a function.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在将属性当作函数使用时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when using a variable that wasn’t previously assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用先前未分配的变量时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when using a variable that wasn't previously assigned.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用先前未分配的变量时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, enables warnings when using an expression whose type may not be compatible with the function parameter expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用其类型可能与预期的功能参数不兼容的表达式时启用警告。

trans-unit.source: If true, every character is replaced with the secret character (see secret_character).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将每个字符替换为秘密字符（请参见secret_character）。

trans-unit.source: If true, execution will block until all data is read from the response.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则执行将阻塞，直到从响应中读取所有数据为止。

trans-unit.source: If true, feedback is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用反馈。

trans-unit.source: If true, feedback is enabled. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用反馈。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, filtering is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用过滤。

trans-unit.source: If true, filtering is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用过滤。

trans-unit.source: If true, filtering is used. This makes the font blurry instead of pixelated when scaling it if font oversampling is disabled or ineffective. It's recommended to enable this when using the font in a control whose size changes over time, unless a pixel art aesthetic is desired.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用过滤。如果禁用了字体过采样或效果不佳，则在缩放字体时会使字体模糊而不是像素化。建议在字体大小随时间变化的控件中使用字体时启用此功能，除非需要像素美感。

trans-unit.source: If true, fog effects are enabled. fog_height_enabled and/or fog_depth_enabled must be set to true to actually display fog.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用雾效果。必须将fog_height_enabled和/或fog_depth_enabled设置为 true 才能实际显示雾。

trans-unit.source: If true, folding is disabled for this TreeItem.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则对此TreeItem禁用折叠。

trans-unit.source: If true, font oversampling is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用字体过采样。

trans-unit.source: If true, forces snapping of polygons to pixels in 2D rendering. May help in some pixel art styles.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在2D渲染中强制将多边形捕捉到像素。可能对某些像素艺术样式有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: If true, forces vertex shading for all rendering. This can increase performance a lot, but also reduces quality immensely. Can be used to optimize performance on low-end mobile devices.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则为所有渲染强制顶点着色。这可以大大提高性能，但也会大大降低质量。可用于优化低端移动设备上的性能。

trans-unit.source: If true, global coordinates are used. If false, local coordinates are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用全局坐标。如果为 false ，则使用局部坐标。

trans-unit.source: If true, global coordinates are used. If false, local coordinates are used. Default value: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用全局坐标。如果为 false ，则使用局部坐标。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, gravity is calculated from a point (set via gravity_vec). Also see space_override. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则从一个点（通过gravity_vec设置）计算重力。另请参见space_override。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, gravity is calculated from a point (set via gravity_vec). See also space_override.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则从一个点（通过gravity_vec设置）计算重力。另请参见space_override。

trans-unit.source: If true, gravity is calculated from a point (set via gravity_vec). Also see space_override. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则从一个点（通过gravity_vec设置）计算重力。另请参见space_override。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, gravity is calculated from a point (set via gravity_vec). See also space_override.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则从一个点（通过gravity_vec设置）计算重力。另请参见space_override。

trans-unit.source: If true, grid items are centered on the X axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则网格项以X轴为中心。

trans-unit.source: If true, grid items are centered on the Y axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则网格项以Y轴为中心。

trans-unit.source: If true, grid items are centered on the Z axis.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则网格项以Z轴为中心。

trans-unit.source: If true, hidden files and directories will be visible in the EditorFileDialog.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在 EditorFileDialog 中将显示隐藏的文件和目录。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the PopupMenu when a checkbox or radio button is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在选中复选框或单选按钮时隐藏PopupMenu。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the PopupMenu when a state item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在选择状态项时隐藏PopupMenu。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the PopupMenu when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在选择一个项目时隐藏PopupMenu。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the PopupMenu when a checkbox or radio button is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在选中复选框或单选按钮时隐藏 PopupMenu 。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the PopupMenu when a state item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在选择状态项时隐藏 PopupMenu 。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the PopupMenu when an item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在选择一个项目时隐藏 PopupMenu 。

trans-unit.source: If true, hides the line of the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则隐藏指定索引的行。

trans-unit.source: If true, ignores the sky contribution when calculating lighting.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在计算光照时忽略天空贡献。

trans-unit.source: If true, instead of using UV2 textures will use a triplanar texture lookup to determine how to apply textures. Triplanar uses the orientation of the object's surface to blend between texture coordinates. It reads from the source texture 3 times, once for each axis and then blends between the results based on how closely the pixel aligns with each axis. This is often used for natural features to get a realistic blend of materials. Because triplanar texturing requires many more texture reads per-pixel it is much slower than normal UV texturing. Additionally, because it is blending the texture between the three axes, it is unsuitable when you are trying to achieve crisp texturing.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ， UV2 使用UV2纹理，而是使用三边形纹理查找来确定如何应用纹理。Triplanar使用对象表面的方向在纹理坐标之间混合。它从源纹理读取3次，每个轴一次，然后根据像素与每个轴的对齐程度在结果之间进行混合。通常将其用于自然特征，以获得逼真的材料混合。由于三面纹理需要每个像素更多的纹理读取，因此它比常规的UV纹理要慢得多。另外，由于它是在三个轴之间混合纹理，因此当您尝试实现清晰的纹理时，它是不合适的。

trans-unit.source: If true, instead of using UV textures will use a triplanar texture lookup to determine how to apply textures. Triplanar uses the orientation of the object's surface to blend between texture coordinates. It reads from the source texture 3 times, once for each axis and then blends between the results based on how closely the pixel aligns with each axis. This is often used for natural features to get a realistic blend of materials. Because triplanar texturing requires many more texture reads per-pixel it is much slower than normal UV texturing. Additionally, because it is blending the texture between the three axes, it is unsuitable when you are trying to achieve crisp texturing.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用三面纹理查找来确定如何应用纹理，而不是使用 UV 纹理。 Triplanar使用对象表面的方向在纹理坐标之间混合。它从源纹理读取3次，每个轴一次，然后根据像素与每个轴的对齐程度在结果之间进行混合。通常将其用于自然特征，以获得逼真的材料混合。由于三面纹理需要每个像素更多的纹理读取，因此它比常规的UV纹理要慢得多。另外，由于它是在三个轴之间混合纹理，因此当您尝试实现清晰的纹理时，它是不合适的。

trans-unit.source: If true, render the contents of the viewport directly to screen. This allows a low-level optimization where you can skip drawing a viewport to the root viewport. While this optimization can result in a significant increase in speed (especially on older devices), it comes at a cost of usability. When this is enabled, you cannot read from the viewport or from the SCREEN_TEXTURE. You also lose the benefit of certain window settings, such as the various stretch modes. Another consequence to be aware of is that in 2D the rendering happens in window coordinates, so if you have a viewport that is double the size of the window, and you set this, then only the portion that fits within the window will be drawn, no automatic scaling is possible, even if your game scene is significantly larger than the window size.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将视口的内容直接呈现到屏幕上。这允许进行低级优化，您可以在其中跳过将视口绘制到根视口的操作。尽管此优化可以显着提高速度（尤其是在较旧的设备上），但要付出可用性的代价。启用此功能后，您将无法从视口或 SCREEN_TEXTURE 中读取内容。您还会失去某些窗口设置（例如各种拉伸模式）的好处。需要注意的另一个结果是，在2D模式下，渲染是在窗口坐标中进行的，因此，如果您的视口是窗口大小的两倍，并且设置了该视口，则只会绘制适合窗口的部分，即使您的游戏场景明显大于窗口大小，也无法自动缩放。

trans-unit.source: If true, rendering of a viewport’s environment is disabled.

For more information see VisualServer.viewport_set_render_direct_to_screen.

trans-unit.source: If true, the button is in disabled state and can’t be clicked or toggled.

trans-unit.source: If true, the button is in disabled state and can't be clicked or toggled.

trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则按钮处于切换模式。每次单击其区域时，使按钮翻转状态在按下和未按下之间。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera is the active camera for the current scene. Only one camera can be current, so setting a different camera current will disable this one.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则摄影机是当前场景的活动摄影机。只能使用一台摄像机，因此设置不同的摄像机 current 将禁用该摄像机。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera only moves when reaching the horizontal drag margins. If false, the camera moves horizontally regardless of margins.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则摄像机仅在达到水平拖动边距时移动。如果为 false ，则照相机不考虑边距而水平移动。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera only moves when reaching the horizontal drag margins. If false, the camera moves horizontally regardless of margins. Default value: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则摄像机仅在达到水平拖动边距时移动。如果为 false ，则照相机不考虑边距而水平移动。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera only moves when reaching the vertical drag margins. If false, the camera moves vertically regardless of margins.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则仅在达到垂直拖动边距时摄像机才会移动。如果为 false ，则照相机不考虑边距而垂直移动。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera only moves when reaching the vertical drag margins. If false, the camera moves vertically regardless of margins. Default value: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则摄像机仅在达到垂直拖动边距时移动。如果为 false ，则相机不考虑边距而垂直移动。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera rotates with the target.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则相机将与目标一起旋转。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera rotates with the target. Default value: false
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则相机将与目标一起旋转。默认值： false

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera smoothly moves towards the target at smoothing_speed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则相机以smoothing_speed平稳地朝目标移动。

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera smoothly moves towards the target at smoothing_speed. Default value: false
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则相机以smoothing_speed平滑地朝目标移动。默认值： false

trans-unit.source: If true, the camera smoothly stops when reaches its limits.

trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则相机停止与PhysicsBody接触。

trans-unit.source: If true, the caret (visual cursor) blinks.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则插入标记（可视光标）闪烁。

trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则插入标记显示为矩形。

trans-unit.source: If true, the cell's UVs will be clipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将修剪单元的UV。

trans-unit.source: If true, the character will be drawn. If false, the character will be hidden. Characters around hidden characters will reflow to take the space of hidden characters. If this is not desired, set their color to Color(1, 1, 1, 0) instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将绘制字符。如果为 false ，则该字符将被隐藏。隐藏字符周围的字符将重排以占用隐藏字符的空间。如果不希望这样做，请将其颜色设置为 Color(1, 1, 1, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the close button will be visible.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则关闭按钮将可见。

trans-unit.source: If true, the color will apply only after the user releases the mouse button, otherwise it will apply immediately even in mouse motion event (which can cause performance issues).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则仅在用户释放鼠标按钮后才应用颜色，否则即使在鼠标移动事件（可能会导致性能问题）的情况下，颜色也将立即应用。

trans-unit.source: If true, the column column is checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则检查column column 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the column will have the "Expand" flag of Control. Columns that have the "Expand" flag will use their "min_width" in a similar fashion to Control.size_flags_stretch_ratio.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则该列将具有Control的“ Expand”标志。具有“ Expand”标志的列将以与Control.size_flags_stretch_ratio相似的方式使用其“ min_width” 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the column will have the “Expand” flag of Control. Columns that have the “Expand” flag will use their “min_width” in a similar fashion to Control.size_flags_stretch_ratio.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则该列将具有Control的“ Expand”标志。具有“ Expand”标志的列将以与Control.size_flags_stretch_ratio相似的方式使用其“ min_width” 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the compatibility with the tilemaps made in Godot 3.1 or earlier is maintained (textures move when the tile origin changes and rotate if the texture size is not homogeneous). This mode presents problems when doing flip_h, flip_v and transpose tile operations on non-homogeneous isometric tiles (e.g. 2:1), in which the texture could not coincide with the collision, thus it is not recommended for isometric or non-square tiles.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将保持与Godot 3.1或更早版本中制作的图块地图的兼容性（当图块原点发生更改时，纹理将移动，如果纹理大小不均匀，则纹理将旋转）。当在非均匀等距图块（例如2：1）上执行 flip_h ， flip_v 和 transpose 图块操作时，此模式会出现问题，其中纹理可能与碰撞不一致，因此不建议用于等距图块或非正方形图块。

trans-unit.source: If true, the context menu will appear when right clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则右键单击将显示上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: If true, the context menu will appear when right-clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则右键单击将显示上下文菜单。

trans-unit.source: If true, the continuous collision detection mode is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用连续碰撞检测模式。

trans-unit.source: If true, the control will automatically resize the height to fit its content.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则控件将自动调整高度大小以适合其内容。

trans-unit.source: If true, the currently selected cell may be selected again.

trans-unit.source: If true, the curve will bake up vectors used for orientation. This is used when PathFollow.rotation_mode is set to PathFollow.ROTATION_ORIENTED. Changing it forces the cache to be recomputed.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则曲线将烘焙用于定向的向量。当PathFollow.rotation_mode设置为PathFollow.ROTATION_ORIENTED时使用。更改它会强制重新计算缓存。

trans-unit.source: If true, the data for this GIProbe will be compressed. Compression saves space, but results in far worse visual quality.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将压缩此 GIProbe 的数据。压缩可以节省空间，但会导致视觉质量大大降低。

trans-unit.source: If true, the depth fog effect is enabled. When enabled, fog will appear in the distance (relative to the camera).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用深度雾效果。启用后，远处将出现雾气（相对于相机）。

trans-unit.source: If true, the dialog is hidden when the OK button is pressed. You can set it to false if you want to do e.g. input validation when receiving the confirmed signal, and handle hiding the dialog in your own logic.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在按下“确定”按钮时对话框将被隐藏。如果要在接收确认信号时进行输入验证（例如，输入验证），并以自己的逻辑隐藏对话框，则可以将其设置为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the dialog is hidden when the OK button is pressed. You can set it to false if you want to do e.g. input validation when receiving the confirmed signal, and handle hiding the dialog in your own logic. Default value: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在按下“确定”按钮时隐藏对话框。如果要在接收确认信号时进行输入验证（例如，输入验证），并以自己的逻辑隐藏对话框，则可以将其设置为 false 。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the dialog will show hidden files.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，对话框将显示隐藏文件。

trans-unit.source: If true, the editor will temporarily unload the library whenever the user switches away from the editor window, allowing the user to recompile the library without restarting Godot.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则每当用户离开编辑器窗口时，编辑器都会临时卸载该库，从而允许用户重新编译该库而无需重新启动Godot。

trans-unit.target: 如果 true ，在指数的影响 effect_idx 在指数上车 bus_idx 启用。

trans-unit.source: If true, the engine optimizes for low processor usage by only refreshing the screen if needed. Can improve battery consumption on mobile.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则引擎仅通过在需要时刷新屏幕来优化低处理器使用率。可以改善手机上的电池消耗。

trans-unit.source: If true, the engine tries to keep the screen on while the game is running. Useful on mobile.

trans-unit.source: If true, the physics engine will use the friction of the object marked as "rough" when two objects collide. If false, the physics engine will use the lowest friction of all colliding objects instead. If true for both colliding objects, the physics engine will use the highest friction.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则当两个对象碰撞时，物理引擎将使用标记为“粗糙”的对象的摩擦。如果为 false ，则物理引擎将使用所有碰撞对象中的最低摩擦。如果两个碰撞对象都为 true ，则物理引擎将使用最高的摩擦力。

trans-unit.source: If true, the playback is paused. You can resume it by setting stream_paused to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则播放暂停。您可以通过将 stream_paused 设置为 false 来恢复它。

trans-unit.source: If true, the popup will not be hidden when a click event occurs outside of it, or when it receives the ui_cancel action event.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在单击事件发生在外部或接收到 ui_cancel 操作事件时，将不会隐藏该弹出窗口。

trans-unit.source: If true, the position between two cached points is interpolated cubically, and linearly otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则对两个缓存点之间的位置进行三次内插，否则进行线性内插。

trans-unit.source: If true, the project will save user data to its own user directory (see application/config/custom_user_dir_name). This setting is only effective on desktop platforms. A name must be set in the application/config/custom_user_dir_name setting for this to take effect. If false, the project will save user data to (OS user data directory)/Godot/app_userdata/(project name).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则项目会将用户数据保存到其自己的用户目录（请参阅application / config / custom_user_dir_name）。此设置仅在桌面平台上有效。必须在application / config / custom_user_dir_name设置中设置一个名称，此名称才能生效。如果为 false ，则项目会将用户数据保存到 (OS user data directory)/Godot/app_userdata/(project name) 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the proximity and distance fade effect is enabled. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用接近和距离淡入淡出效果。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the proximity fade effect is enabled. The proximity fade effect fades out each pixel based on its distance to another object.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用接近淡入效果。接近淡入淡出效果会根据每个像素到另一个对象的距离淡出每个像素。

trans-unit.source: If true, the query will take Areas into account.

trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则更新远程节点的位置。

trans-unit.source: If true, the resource will be made unique in each instance of its local scene. It can thus be modified in a scene instance without impacting other instances of that same scene.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则该资源将在其本地场景的每个实例中变得唯一。因此，可以在场景实例中对其进行修改，而不会影响该同一场景的其他实例。

trans-unit.source: If true, the result after 3D rendering will not have a linear to sRGB color conversion applied. This is important when the viewport is used as a render target where the result is used as a texture on a 3D object rendered in another viewport. It is also important if the viewport is used to create data that is not color based (noise, heightmaps, pickmaps, etc.). Do not enable this when the viewport is used as a texture on a 2D object or if the viewport is your final output.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则3D渲染后的结果将不会应用线性到sRGB的颜色转换。当视口用作渲染目标，其中结果用作另一个视口中渲染的3D对象的纹理时，这一点很重要。如果将视口用于创建非基于颜色的数据（噪声，高度图，拾取图等），则也很重要。当视口用作2D对象上的纹理或视口是最终输出时，请勿启用此功能。

trans-unit.source: If true, the result of rendering will be flipped vertically.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则渲染结果将垂直翻转。

trans-unit.source: If true, the result of rendering will be flipped vertically. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则渲染结果将垂直翻转。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the resulting texture contains a normal map created from the original noise interpreted as a bump map.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则生成的纹理包含从原始噪声创建的法线贴图，该原始噪波被解释为凹凸贴图。

trans-unit.source: If true, the screen-space ambient occlusion effect is enabled. This darkens objects' corners and cavities to simulate ambient light not reaching the entire object as in real life. This works well for small, dynamic objects, but baked lighting or ambient occlusion textures will do a better job at displaying ambient occlusion on large static objects. This is a costly effect and should be disabled first when running into performance issues.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则启用屏幕空间环境光遮挡效果。这会使物体的角落和空腔变暗，以模拟环境光无法像现实生活中那样到达整个物体。这对于小型的动态对象效果很好，但是烘焙的灯光或环境光遮挡纹理在显示大型静态物体上的环境光遮挡方面会做得更好。这是一个代价高昂的效果，当遇到性能问题时，应首先禁用它。

trans-unit.source: If true, the scrollbar is visible. Does not block scrolling completely. See scroll_to_line. Default value: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则滚动条可见。不会完全阻止滚动。参见scroll_to_line。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the scrollbar is visible. Setting this to false does not block scrolling completely. See scroll_to_line.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则滚动条可见。将此设置为 false 不会完全阻止滚动。参见scroll_to_line。

trans-unit.source: If true, the shader will compute extra operations to make sure the normal stays correct when using a non-uniform scale. Only enable if using non-uniform scaling.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则着色器将计算额外的操作，以确保使用不均匀的缩放比例时法线保持正确。仅在使用非均匀缩放比例时启用。

trans-unit.source: If true, the shader will discard all pixels that have an alpha value less than params_alpha_scissor_threshold.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则着色器将丢弃alpha值小于params_alpha_scissor_threshold的所有像素。

trans-unit.source: If true, the shader will keep the scale set for the mesh. Otherwise the scale is lost when billboarding. Only applies when params_billboard_mode is BILLBOARD_ENABLED.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则着色器将保持为网格设置缩放比例。否则，在制作广告牌时会丢失比例尺。只有当适用params_billboard_mode被BILLBOARD_ENABLED。

trans-unit.source: If true, the shader will read depth texture at multiple points along the view ray to determine occlusion and parrallax. This can be very performance demanding, but results in more realistic looking depth mapping.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则着色器将沿视线在多个点处读取深度纹理，以确定遮挡和旁视。这可能对性能要求很高，但是会导致看起来更逼真的深度映射。

trans-unit.source: If true, the shape owner and its shapes are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则禁用形状所有者及其形状。

trans-unit.source: If true, the size override affects stretch as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则大小覆盖也会影响拉伸。

trans-unit.source: If true, the slider can be interacted with. If false, the value can be changed only by code.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则可以与滑块进行交互。如果为 false ，则只能通过代码更改值。

trans-unit.source: If true, the slider will display ticks for minimum and maximum values.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则滑块将显示最小和最大值的刻度。

trans-unit.source: If true, the sound will be recorded. Note that restarting the recording will remove the previously recorded sample.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将录制声音。请注意，重新开始记录将删除先前记录的样本。

trans-unit.source: If true, the specified flag will be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将启用指定的标志。

trans-unit.source: If true, the stream will automatically loop when it reaches the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则流到达末尾时将自动循环。

trans-unit.source: If true, the sub-animation will restart automatically after finishing.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则子动画将在完成后自动重新启动。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture importer will import VRAM-compressed textures using the BPTC algorithm. This texture compression algorithm is only supported on desktop platforms, and only when using the GLES3 renderer.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理导入器将使用BPTC算法导入VRAM压缩的纹理。仅在桌面平台上以及仅在使用GLES3渲染器时才支持此纹理压缩算法。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture importer will import VRAM-compressed textures using the Ericsson Texture Compression 2 algorithm. This texture compression algorithm is only supported when using the GLES3 renderer.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理导入器将使用爱立信纹理压缩2算法导入VRAM压缩的纹理。仅当使用GLES3渲染器时才支持此纹理压缩算法。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture importer will import VRAM-compressed textures using the Ericsson Texture Compression algorithm. This algorithm doesn’t support alpha channels in textures.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理导入器将使用爱立信纹理压缩算法导入VRAM压缩的纹理。此算法不支持纹理中的Alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture importer will import VRAM-compressed textures using the Ericsson Texture Compression algorithm. This algorithm doesn't support alpha channels in textures.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理导入器将使用爱立信纹理压缩算法导入VRAM压缩的纹理。此算法不支持纹理中的Alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture importer will import VRAM-compressed textures using the PowerVR Texture Compression algorithm. This texture compression algorithm is only supported on iOS.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理导入器将使用PowerVR纹理压缩算法导入VRAM压缩的纹理。仅iOS支持此纹理压缩算法。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture importer will import VRAM-compressed textures using the S3 Texture Compression algorithm. This algorithm is only supported on desktop platforms and consoles.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理导入器将使用S3纹理压缩算法导入VRAM压缩的纹理。仅台式机平台和控制台支持此算法。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture scales to fit its bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理将缩放以适合其边界矩形。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture scales to fit its bounding rectangle. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理将缩放以适合其边界矩形。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture stretches to the edges of the node’s bounding rectangle using the stretch_mode. If false, the texture will not scale with the node. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用Stretch_mode将纹理拉伸到节点边界矩形的边缘。如果为 false ，则纹理将不会随节点缩放。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture stretches to the edges of the node's bounding rectangle using the stretch_mode. If false, the texture will not scale with the node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用Stretch_mode将纹理拉伸到节点边界矩形的边缘。如果为 false ，则纹理将不会随节点缩放。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture’s transparency and the opacity are used to make those parts of the Sprite invisible. Default value: true.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理的透明度和不透明度用于使Sprite的那些部分不可见。默认值： true 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the texture's transparency and the opacity are used to make those parts of the sprite invisible.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理的透明度和不透明度用于使精灵的那些部分不可见。

trans-unit.source: If true, the textures will be centered in the middle of each tile. This is useful for certain isometric or top-down modes when textures are made larger or smaller than the tiles (e.g. to avoid flickering on tile edges). The offset is still applied, but from the center of the tile. If used, compatibility_mode is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则纹理将在每个图块的中间居中。当纹理大于或小于图块时（例如，避免在图块边缘闪烁），这对于某些等距或自上而下的模式很有用。偏移仍然适用，但从图块的中心开始。如果使用，则忽略compatibility_mode。

trans-unit.source: If true, the timer is paused and will not process until it is unpaused again, even if start is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则计时器将暂停并且不会被处理，直到再次取消暂停为止，即使调用了start。

trans-unit.source: If true, the timer will automatically start when entering the scene tree.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则进入场景树时计时器将自动启动。

trans-unit.source: If true, the timer will automatically start when entering the scene tree. Default value: false.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则进入场景树时计时器将自动启动。默认值： false 。

trans-unit.source: If true, the timer will stop when reaching 0. If false, it will restart.

trans-unit.source: If true, the timer will stop when reaching 0. If false, it will restart. Default value: false.

trans-unit.source: If true, the viewport rendering will receive benefits from High Dynamic Range algorithm. High Dynamic Range allows the viewport to receive values that are outside the 0-1 range. In Godot HDR uses 16 bits, meaning it does not store the full range of a floating point number.

trans-unit.source: If true, uses a high amount of samples to create blurred variants of reflection probes and panorama backgrounds (sky). Those blurred variants are used by rough materials.

trans-unit.source: If true, uses faster but lower-quality Lambert material lighting model instead of Burley.

trans-unit.source: If true, uses fractional delta which smooths the movement of the particles. Equivalent to Particles.fract_delta.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则使用分数增量来平滑粒子的运动。等效于Particles.fract_delta。

trans-unit.source: If true, uses nearest-neighbor mipmap filtering when using mipmaps (also called "bilinear filtering"), which will result in visible seams appearing between mipmap stages. This may increase performance in mobile as less memory bandwidth is used. If false, linear mipmap filtering (also called "trilinear filtering") is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用mipmap时使用最近邻mipmap过滤（也称为“双线性过滤”），这将导致在mipmap阶段之间出现可见的接缝。由于使用了较少的内存带宽，因此可以提高移动设备的性能。如果为 false ，则使用线性mipmap过滤（也称为“三线性过滤”）。

trans-unit.source: If true, uses nearest-neighbor mipmap filtering when using mipmaps (also called “bilinear filtering”), which will result in visible seams appearing between mipmap stages. This may increase performance in mobile as less memory bandwidth is used. If false, linear mipmap filtering (also called “trilinear filtering”) is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则在使用mipmap时使用最近邻mipmap过滤（也称为“双线性过滤”），这将导致在mipmap阶段之间出现可见的接缝。由于使用了较少的内存带宽，因此可以提高移动设备的性能。如果为 false ，则使用线性mipmap过滤（也称为“三线性过滤”）。

trans-unit.source: If true, uses texture arrays instead of mipmaps for reflection probes and panorama backgrounds (sky). This reduces jitter noise on reflections, but costs more performance and memory.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 true ，则将纹理数组而不是mipmap用于反射探针和全景背景（天空）。这样可以减少反射时的抖动噪声，但会增加性能和存储空间。

trans-unit.source: If use_global_execution_context is true, the code will be evaluated in the global execution context. Otherwise, it is evaluated in the execution context of a function within the engine’s runtime environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果 use_global_execution_context 为 true ，那么将在全局执行上下文中评估代码。否则，将在引擎的运行时环境中的函数的执行上下文中对其进行评估。

trans-unit.source: If use_global_execution_context is true, the code will be evaluated in the global execution context. Otherwise, it is evaluated in the execution context of a function within the engine's runtime environment.
trans-unit.target: 如果 use_global_execution_context 为 true ，那么将在全局执行上下文中评估代码。否则，将在引擎的运行时环境中的函数的执行上下文中对其进行评估。

trans-unit.source: If width or height is set to 0, the image size will be adjusted in order to keep the original aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 如果 width 或 height 设置为0，将调整图像尺寸以保持原始的纵横比。

trans-unit.source: If wrap is enabled, the method will wrap around to the first visible element in the tree when called on the last visible element, otherwise it returns null.

trans-unit.target: 如果 wrap 被启用，该方法将环绕在被称为第一个可见的元素时，树中的最后一个可见的元素，否则返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: If a Mesh.lightmap_size_hint isn't specified, the lightmap baker will dynamically set the lightmap size using this value. This value is measured in texels per world unit. The maximum lightmap texture size is 4096x4096.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定Mesh.lightmap_size_hint，则光照贴图贝克将使用该值动态设置光照贴图的大小。该值以每世界单位的纹理像素度量。最大的光照贴图纹理大小为4096x4096。

trans-unit.source: If a connection is available, return a StreamPeerTCP with the connection/
trans-unit.target: 如果一个连接是可用的,返回一个带有连接/的StreamPeerTCP。

trans-unit.source: If a connection is available, returns a StreamPeerTCP with the connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果有连接,返回一个带有连接的StreamPeerTCP。

trans-unit.source: If a given character is included in more than one font, it appears only once in the returned string.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个给定的字符被包含在一个以上的字体中,它在返回的字符串中只出现一次。

trans-unit.source: If a material is assigned to this property, it will be used instead of any material set in any material slot of the mesh.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个材料被分配到这个属性,它将被用来代替设置在网格的任何材料槽中的任何材料。

trans-unit.target: 如果一个材料被分配给这个属性,它将被用来代替任何其他物理材料,例如继承的材料。

trans-unit.target: 如果一个预览无效(改变),这个信号将发出(使用预览的路径)。

trans-unit.source: If a viewport is a child of a ViewportContainer, it will automatically take up its size, otherwise it must be set manually.
trans-unit.target: 如果视口是ViewportContainer的子级，它将自动占用其大小，否则必须手动设置。

trans-unit.source: If above 0, this value is the maximum value for an impulse that this Joint produces.
trans-unit.target: 如果高于0,该值是该Joint产生的脉冲的最大值。

trans-unit.source: If active IME handles key events before the application and creates an composition string and suggestion list.
trans-unit.target: 如果激活 IME 在应用程序之前处理关键事件,并创建一个组成字符串和建议列表。

trans-unit.target: 如果激活,则返回相关控制器的名称(如果由使用的AR/VR SDK提供)。

trans-unit.source: If any of the controls added can gain keyboard focus, add it here. This ensures that focus will be restored if the inspector is refreshed.

trans-unit.source: If applied after a blend or mix, affects all input animations to that blend or mix.
trans-unit.target: 如果在混合后应用,会影响该混合的所有输入动画。

trans-unit.source: If below 0.05, this behavior is locked.
trans-unit.target: 如果低于0.05,则锁定此行为。

trans-unit.target: 如果低于0.05，则此行为被锁定。默认值： PI/4 。

trans-unit.target: 如果两者都是相同的向量类型（Vector2，Vector3或Color），则返回值将是相同的类型（ lerp 然后调用向量类型的 linear_interpolate 方法）。

trans-unit.source: If either X or Y component is not greater than zero, icon size won't be affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果X或Y分量不大于0,图标的大小不会受到影响。

trans-unit.target: 如果从Autodesk Maya导出FBX场景,请使用这些FBX导出设置。

trans-unit.source: If greater than 0, value will always be rounded to a multiple of step. If rounded is also true, value will first be rounded to a multiple of step then rounded to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于0，则 value 将始终四舍五入为 step 的倍数。如果 rounded 也为 true ，则 value 将首先四舍五入为 step 整数倍，然后四舍五入为最接近的整数。

trans-unit.source: If greater than zero, overrides the window height when running the game. Useful for testing stretch modes.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于零,则覆盖运行游戏时的窗口高度。对测试拉伸模式很有用。

trans-unit.source: If greater than zero, overrides the window width when running the game. Useful for testing stretch modes.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于零,则覆盖运行游戏时的窗口宽度。对测试拉伸模式很有用。

trans-unit.source: If greater than zero, the content will be split among the specified columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于零,则内容将被分割到指定的列中。

trans-unit.source: If greater than zero, uses a different height for the window when running from the editor. The main use for this is to test with stretch modes.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于零,从编辑器中运行时,对窗口使用不同的高度。主要用于测试拉伸模式。

trans-unit.source: If greater than zero, uses a different width for the window when running from the editor. The main use for this is to test with stretch modes.
trans-unit.target: 如果大于零,从编辑器中运行时,对窗口使用不同的宽度。主要用于测试拉伸模式。

trans-unit.source: If handed an argument, return the argument from the @GDScript.yield call in the yielded function call. You can pass e.g. an Array to hand multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了参数，则从产生的函数调用中的@ GDScript.yield调用返回该参数。您可以传递一个数组来传递多个参数。

trans-unit.source: If ignore is true, the VisualServer does not perform clipping.
trans-unit.target: 如果ignore为 true ，则VisualServer不会执行裁剪。

trans-unit.source: If implemented, gets the dependencies of a given resource. If add_types is true, paths should be appended ::TypeName, where TypeName is the class name of the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现，则获取给定资源的依赖关系。如果 add_types 为 true ，则路径应附加::: ::TypeName ，其中 TypeName 是依赖项的类名称。

trans-unit.source: If implemented, gets the dependencies of a given resource. If add_types is true, paths should be appended ::TypeName, where TypeName is the class name of the dependency. Note that custom resource types defined by scripts aren’t known by the ClassDB, so you might just return "Resource" for them.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现，则获取给定资源的依赖关系。如果 add_types 为 true ，则路径应附加 ::TypeName ，其中 TypeName 是依赖项的类名称。请注意，ClassDB不知道脚本定义的自定义资源类型，因此您可以为它们返回 "Resource" 。

trans-unit.source: If implemented, renames dependencies within the given resource and saves it. renames is a dictionary { String => String } mapping old dependency paths to new paths.
trans-unit.target: 如果实现，则在给定资源内重命名依赖项并保存。 renames 是字典 { String => String } 将旧的依赖路径映射到新路径。

trans-unit.source: If implemented, the method must return a boolean value. true ends the main loop, while false lets it proceed to the next frame.
trans-unit.target: 如果已实现，则该方法必须返回布尔值。 true 结束主循环，而 false 则继续进行下一帧。

trans-unit.source: If in doubt, leave this setting empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果有疑问,请将此设置留空。

trans-unit.target: 如果在编辑器中,你可以使用菜单选项设置整个骨架的休息姿势,从代码中,你需要在骨骼上迭代设置它们的各个休息姿势。

trans-unit.source: If it is not enabled or does not have a valid target set, InterpolatedCamera acts like a normal Camera.
trans-unit.target: 如果未启用它或没有有效的目标集，则InterpolatedCamera的行为就像普通的Camera。

trans-unit.source: If left to default value, each item will have a width equal to the width of its content and the columns will have an uneven width.
trans-unit.target: 如果将其设为默认值,则每个项目的宽度将等于其内容的宽度,而列的宽度将不均匀。

trans-unit.source: If no port is specified (or -1 is used), it is automatically set to 80 for HTTP and 443 for HTTPS (if use_ssl is enabled).
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 port （或使用 -1 ），则HTTP自动设置为80，HTTPS自动设置为443（如果启用了 use_ssl ）。

trans-unit.source: If non-empty, this locale will be used when running the project from the editor.
trans-unit.target: 如果不为空,当从编辑器中运行项目时,将使用这个locale。

trans-unit.source: If not DOPPLER_TRACKING_DISABLED this Camera will simulate the Doppler effect for objects changed in particular _process methods. Default value: DOPPLER_TRACKING_DISABLED.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是DOPPLER_TRACKING_DISABLED，则此相机将针对在特定 _process 方法中更改的对象模拟多普勒效果。默认值：DOPPLER_TRACKING_DISABLED。

trans-unit.source: If not DOPPLER_TRACKING_DISABLED, this camera will simulate the Doppler effect for objects changed in particular _process methods. See DopplerTracking for possible values.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是DOPPLER_TRACKING_DISABLED，则此相机将针对在特定 _process 方法中更改的对象模拟多普勒效果。有关可能的值，请参见DopplerTracking。

trans-unit.source: If not overridden, default behavior is checking if the point is within control's Rect.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有被覆盖,默认行为是检查该点是否在控件的Rect范围内。

trans-unit.source: If not overridden, defaults to Vector2.ZERO.
trans-unit.target: 如果未覆盖，则默认为Vector2.ZERO。

trans-unit.source: If not overridden, defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: 如果未覆盖，则默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: If one or several properties have changed, this must be called. field is used in case your editor can modify fields separately (as an example, Vector3.x). The changing argument avoids the editor requesting this property to be refreshed (leave as false if unsure).
trans-unit.target: 如果一个或多个属性已更改，则必须调用它。 field 是在情况下，使用编辑器可以单独修改字段（作为一个例子，Vector3.x）。在 changing 参数避免请求这个属性编辑器被刷新（如休假 false ，如果不确定）。

trans-unit.source: If passed an object and a signal, the execution is resumed when the object emits the given signal. In this case, yield() returns the argument passed to emit_signal() if the signal takes only one argument, or an array containing all the arguments passed to emit_signal() if the signal takes multiple arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了对象和信号，则在对象发出给定信号时恢复执行。在这种情况下，如果信号仅接受一个参数， yield() 返回传递给 emit_signal() 的参数；如果信号接受多个参数，则返回一个包含传递给 emit_signal() 所有参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: If playing, the current animation; otherwise, the animation last played. When set, would change the animation, but would not play it unless currently playing. See also current_animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在播放，当前动画；否则，动画最后播放。设置后，将更改动画，但除非当前正在播放，否则将不播放它。另请参阅current_animation。

trans-unit.source: If provided by the ARVRInterface, this returns a mesh associated with the controller. This can be used to visualize the controller.
trans-unit.target: 如果由ARVRInterface提供，则返回与控制器关联的网格。这可用于可视化控制器。

trans-unit.source: If provided by the ARVRInterface, this returns a mesh object for the anchor. For an anchor, this can be a shape related to the object being tracked or it can be a mesh that provides topology related to the anchor and can be used to create shadows/reflections on surfaces or for generating collision shapes.
trans-unit.target: 如果由ARVRInterface提供，则返回锚点的网格对象。对于锚点，这可以是与要跟踪的对象有关的形状，也可以是提供与锚点有关的拓扑的网格，可以用于在表面上创建阴影/反射或生成碰撞形状。

trans-unit.source: If selectable is true the list item will be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 如果selectable为 true ,则列表项将为可选。

trans-unit.source: If selectable is true, the list item will be selectable.
trans-unit.target: 如果selectable为 true ，则列表项将是可选的。

trans-unit.source: If set on a Popup node instance, a popup menu icon appears in the top-right corner of the TabContainer. Clicking it will expand the Popup node.
trans-unit.target: 如果在Popup节点实例上设置，则会在 TabContainer 的右上角显示一个弹出菜单图标。单击它将展开“ 弹出”节点。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, all columns will have the same width specified by fixed_column_width.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true ，则所有列将具有由fixed_column_width指定的相同宽度。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, signal emission is blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true ，则阻止信号发射。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the ReferenceRect will only be visible while in editor. Otherwise, ReferenceRect will be visible in game.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true ，则 ReferenceRect 仅在编辑器中可见。否则， ReferenceRect 将在游戏中可见。

trans-unit.source: If set to anything other than the default, the content will be split among the specified columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为默认值以外的其他值,则内容将被分割到指定的列中。

trans-unit.source: If set, the order of the vertices in each triangle are reversed resulting in the backside of the mesh being drawn.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置,则每个三角形的顶点顺序会被颠倒,导致网格的背面被绘制。

trans-unit.source: If set, the order of the vertices in each triangle are reversed resulting in the backside of the mesh being drawn. Result is the same as using *CULL_BACK* in SpatialMaterial. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置，则将每个三角形中的顶点顺序颠倒，从而绘制网格的背面。结果与在SpatialMaterial中使用* CULL_BACK * 相同。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: If specified, this X509Certificate will be the only one accepted when connecting to an SSL host. Any other certificate provided by the server will be regarded as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，此X509证书将是连接到SSL主机时唯一接受的证书。服务器提供的任何其他证书将被视为无效。

trans-unit.source: If supported, returns the status of our tracking. This will allow you to provide feedback to the user whether there are issues with positional tracking.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持,返回我们的跟踪状态。这将允许你向用户提供反馈,是否有位置跟踪的问题。

trans-unit.source: If supported, the function parse_begin will be called, allowing to place custom controls at the beginning of the class.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持，函数parse_begin将被调用，从而允许将自定义控件放置在类的开头。

trans-unit.source: If the cancel parameter is true, an option to restore the edited value to the original is provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果 cancel 参数为 true ，则提供将已编辑的值恢复为原始值的选项。

trans-unit.source: If the from and to arguments are of type int or float, the return value is a float.
trans-unit.target: 如果 from 和 to 参数的类型为int或float，则返回值为float。

trans-unit.source: If the target is destroyed in the game’s lifecycle, the connection will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果 target 在游戏的生命周期中被破坏，则连接将丢失。

trans-unit.source: If the target is destroyed in the game's lifecycle, the connection will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 如果 target 在游戏的生命周期中被破坏，则连接将丢失。

trans-unit.source: If the animation has been paused by stop(true) it will be resumed backwards. Calling play_backwards() without arguments will also resume the animation backwards.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画已通过 stop(true) 暂停，则它将向后恢复。不带参数调用 play_backwards() 也会向后恢复动画。

trans-unit.source: If the animation has been paused by stop(true) it will be resumed. Calling play() without arguments will also resume the animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果动画已通过 stop(true) 暂停，它将继续播放。不带参数调用 play() 也会恢复动画。

trans-unit.source: If the audio configuration has more than two speakers, this sets the target channels. See MixTarget constants.
trans-unit.target: 如果音频配置具有两个以上的扬声器，则设置目标声道。请参见MixTarget常量。

trans-unit.source: If the audio configuration has more than two speakers, this sets the target channels. See MIX_TARGET_* constants.
trans-unit.target: 如果音频配置具有两个以上的扬声器，则设置目标声道。请参见 MIX_TARGET_* 常量。

trans-unit.source: If the body collides, it will change direction a maximum of max_slides times before it stops.
trans-unit.target: 如果物体碰撞，它将在停止之前最多改变 max_slides 次。

trans-unit.source: If the body is at least this close to another body, this body will consider them to be colliding.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个身体与另一个身体至少有这么近的距离,这个身体就会认为它们是相撞的。

trans-unit.source: If the cancel parameter is true, an option to restore the edited value to the original is provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果cancel参数为 true ，则提供将已编辑的值恢复为原始值的选项。

trans-unit.source: If the channel is not negotiated out-of-band the id will only be available after the connection is established (will return 65535 until then).
trans-unit.target: 如果未协商带外通道，则仅在建立连接后才能使用该ID（在此之前将返回 65535 ）。

trans-unit.source: If the currently being played animation changes, this signal will notify of such change.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在播放的动画发生变化,该信号将通知该变化。

trans-unit.source: If the curve has no up vectors, the function sends an error to the console, and returns (0, 1, 0).
trans-unit.target: 如果曲线没有向上矢量，则该函数将错误发送到控制台，并返回 (0, 1, 0) 。

trans-unit.source: If the device has a gyroscope, this will return the rate of rotation in rad/s around a device’s x, y, and z axis. Otherwise, it returns an empty Vector3.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备具有陀螺仪，它将返回围绕设备的x，y和z轴的弧度旋转速率。否则，它返回一个空的Vector3。

trans-unit.source: If the device has a magnetometer, this will return the magnetic field strength in micro-Tesla for all axes.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备有磁力计,这将返回所有轴的磁场强度,单位为微特斯拉。

trans-unit.source: If the device has an accelerometer, this will return the acceleration. Otherwise, it returns an empty Vector3.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备具有加速度计，它将返回加速度。否则，它返回一个空的Vector3。

trans-unit.source: If the device has an accelerometer, this will return the gravity. Otherwise, it returns an empty Vector3.
trans-unit.target: 如果设备具有加速度计，这将返回重力。否则，它返回一个空的Vector3。

trans-unit.source: If the dock is repositioned and as long as the plugin is active, the editor will save the dock position on further sessions.
trans-unit.target: 如果dock被重新定位,并且只要插件处于活动状态,编辑器就会在以后的会话中保存dock位置。

trans-unit.source: If the image does not have mipmaps, they will be generated and used internally, but no mipmaps will be generated on the resulting image.
trans-unit.target: 如果图像没有mipmaps,它们将被生成并在内部使用,但不会在生成的图像上生成mipmaps。

trans-unit.source: If the image does not have mipmaps, they will be generated and used internally, but no mipmaps will be generated on the resulting image. (Note that if you intend to scale multiple copies of the original image, it’s better to call generate_mipmaps on it in advance, to avoid wasting processing power in generating them again and again.)
trans-unit.target: 如果图像没有mipmap，则将在内部生成和使用它们，但是在生成的图像上将不会生成mipmap。（请注意，如果您打算缩放原始图像的多个副本，最好事先对其调用调用 generate_mipmaps ，以避免在一次又一次地生成它们时浪费处理能力。）

trans-unit.source: If the node and at least one of its neighbours uses the SIZE_EXPAND size flag, the parent Container will let it take more or less space depending on this property. If this node has a stretch ratio of 2 and its neighbour a ratio of 1, this node will take two thirds of the available space.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点及其至少一个邻居使用SIZE_EXPAND size标志，则父Container将根据此属性让它占用更多或更少的空间。如果此节点的拉伸比为2，其邻居的拉伸比为1，则此节点将占用可用空间的三分之二。

trans-unit.source: If the object already had a script, the previous script instance will be freed and its variables and state will be lost. The new script's _init method will be called.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象已具有脚本，则先前的脚本实例将被释放，并且其变量和状态将丢失。新脚本的_init方法将被调用。

trans-unit.source: If the project name is empty, user:// falls back to res://.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目名称为空，则 user:// 退回到 res:// 。

trans-unit.source: If the ray did not intersect anything, then an empty dictionary is returned instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果射线没有相交,则返回一个空字典。

trans-unit.source: If you do this for a platform that handles its own output (such as OpenVR) Godot will show just one eye without distortion on screen. Alternatively you can add a separate viewport node to your scene and enable AR/VR on that viewport and it will be used to output to the HMD leaving you free to do anything you like in the main window such as using a separate camera as a spectator camera or render out something completely different.
trans-unit.target: 如果你为一个处理自己输出的平台(如OpenVR)这样做,Godot将只显示一只眼睛,而不会在屏幕上失真。或者你可以在场景中添加一个单独的视口节点,并在该视口上启用AR/VR,它将被用于输出到HMD,让你可以在主窗口中自由地做任何你想做的事情,例如使用一个单独的摄像机作为旁观者摄像机,或者渲染出完全不同的东西。

trans-unit.source: If you do this for a platform that handles its own output (such as OpenVR) Godot will show just one eye without distortion on screen. Alternatively, you can add a separate viewport node to your scene and enable AR/VR on that viewport. It will be used to output to the HMD, leaving you free to do anything you like in the main window, such as using a separate camera as a spectator camera or rendering something completely different.
trans-unit.target: 如果你对处理自己输出的平台(如OpenVR)这样做,Godot将只显示一只眼睛,而不会在屏幕上失真。或者,你可以在场景中添加一个单独的视口节点,并在该视口上启用AR/VR。它将用于输出到HMD,让你在主窗口中自由地做任何你喜欢的事情,例如使用单独的相机作为旁观者相机或渲染完全不同的东西。

trans-unit.source: In 2D, all visible objects are some form of canvas item. In order to be visible, a canvas item needs to be the child of a canvas attached to a viewport, or it needs to be the child of another canvas item that is eventually attached to the canvas.
trans-unit.target: 在2D中,所有可见的对象都是某种形式的画布项。为了可见,一个画布项需要是连接到视口的画布的子项,或者它需要是最终连接到画布的另一个画布项的子项。

trans-unit.source: In 3D, all visible objects are comprised of a resource and an instance. A resource can be a mesh, a particle system, a light, or any other 3D object. In order to be visible resources must be attached to an instance using instance_set_base. The instance must also be attached to the scenario using instance_set_scenario in order to be visible.
trans-unit.target: 在3D中，所有可见对象均由资源和实例组成。资源可以是网格，粒子系统，光源或任何其他3D对象。为了可见，必须使用instance_set_base将资源附加到实例。为了使实例可见，还必须使用instance_set_scenario将实例附加到方案。

trans-unit.source: In 3D, all visual objects must be associated with a scenario. The scenario is a visual representation of the world. If accessing the visual server from a running game, the scenario can be accessed from the scene tree from any Spatial node with Spatial.get_world. Otherwise, a scenario can be created with scenario_create.
trans-unit.target: 在3D中，所有视觉对象必须与场景相关联。该场景是世界的视觉表示。如果从正在运行的游戏访问视觉服务器，则可以从任何具有Spatial.get_world的Spatial节点的场景树中访问场景。否则，可以使用censage_create创建一个方案。

trans-unit.source: In SELECT_ROW and SELECT_SINGLE modes, the focused item is same as the selected item. In SELECT_MULTI mode, the focused item is the item under the focus cursor, not necessarily selected.
trans-unit.target: 在SELECT_ROW和SELECT_SINGLE模式下，重点突出的项目与所选项目相同。在SELECT_MULTI模式下，焦点项目是焦点光标下的项目，不一定要选择。

trans-unit.source: In SELECT_SINGLE mode, the focused column is the selected column. In SELECT_ROW mode, the focused column is always 0 if any item is selected. In SELECT_MULTI mode, the focused column is the column under the focus cursor, and there are not necessarily any column selected.
trans-unit.target: 在SELECT_SINGLE模式下，焦点所在的列是选定的列。在SELECT_ROW模式下，如果选择了任何一项，则焦点列始终为0。在SELECT_MULTI模式下，聚焦的列是聚焦光标下方的列，并且不必选择任何列。

trans-unit.source: In GDScript, functions are not first-class objects. This means it is impossible to store them directly as variables, return them from another function, or pass them as arguments.
trans-unit.target: 在GDScript中，函数不是一流的对象。这意味着不可能将它们直接存储为变量，从另一个函数返回它们或将它们作为参数传递。

trans-unit.source: In certain circumstances, the batcher can reorder items in order to better join them. This may result in better performance. An overlap test is needed however for each item lookahead, so there is a trade off, with diminishing returns. If you are getting no benefit, setting this to 0 will switch it off.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下,批示员可以重新排序项目,以便更好地加入它们。这可能会带来更好的性能。然而对于每个项目看前需要进行重叠测试,所以有一个交易,回报率越来越低。如果你没有得到任何好处,将此设置为0就可以关闭它。

trans-unit.source: In computer programming, a Variant class is a class that is designed to store a variety of other types. Dynamic programming languages like PHP, Lua, JavaScript and GDScript like to use them to store variables' data on the backend. With these Variants, properties are able to change value types freely.
trans-unit.target: 在计算机编程中,Variant类是一个被设计用来存储各种其他类型的类。像PHP、Lua、JavaScript和GDScript这样的动态编程语言喜欢用它们在后台存储变量的数据。有了这些Variant类,属性就可以自由改变值的类型。

trans-unit.target: 为了使NOTIFICATION_TRANSFORM_CHANGED起作用，用户首先需要使用set_notify_transform进行询问。

trans-unit.source: In the Inspector you can enable (show) or disable (hide) slots. By default all slots are disabled so you may not see any slots on your GraphNode initially. You can assign a type to each slot. Only slots of the same type will be able to connect to each other. You can also assign colors to slots. A tuple of input and output slots is defined for each GUI element included in the GraphNode. Input connections are on the left and output connections are on the right side of GraphNode. Only enabled slots are counted as connections.
trans-unit.target: 在检查器中,您可以启用(显示)或禁用(隐藏)插槽。默认情况下,所有插槽都是禁用的,因此最初可能看不到 GraphNode 上的任何插槽。您可以为每个插槽指定一个类型。只有同一类型的插槽才能相互连接。您还可以为插槽指定颜色。为 GraphNode 中包含的每个 GUI 元素定义了一个输入和输出插槽的元组。输入连接在 GraphNode 的左侧,输出连接在右侧。只有启用的插槽才算作连接。

trans-unit.source: Including color in the vertex format has a cost, however, not including color prevents batching across color changes. This threshold determines the ratio of number of vertex color changes / total number of vertices above which vertices will be translated to colored format. A value of 0 will always use colored vertices, 1 will never use colored vertices.
trans-unit.target: 在顶点格式中包含颜色是有代价的，但是，不包含颜色会阻止跨颜色更改进行批处理。此阈值确定 number of vertex color changes / total number of vertices 的数量/顶点总数的比率，高于此数目的顶点将被转换为彩色格式。值为0时将始终使用彩色顶点，值为1时将永远不使用彩色顶点。

trans-unit.source: Inflates or deflates polygon by delta units (pixels). If delta is positive, makes the polygon grow outward. If delta is negative, shrinks the polygon inward. Returns an array of polygons because inflating/deflating may result in multiple discrete polygons. Returns an empty array if delta is negative and the absolute value of it approximately exceeds the minimum bounding rectangle dimensions of the polygon.
trans-unit.target: 以 delta 单位（像素）对 polygon 进行充气或放气。如果 delta 为正，则使多边形向外增长。如果 delta 为负，则向内缩小多边形。返回多边形数组，因为扩展/缩小可能会导致多个离散的多边形。如果 delta 为负，并且其绝对值大约超过多边形的最小边界矩形尺寸，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Inflates or deflates polyline by delta units (pixels), producing polygons. If delta is positive, makes the polyline grow outward. Returns an array of polygons because inflating/deflating may result in multiple discrete polygons. If delta is negative, returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 以 delta 单位（像素）对多义 polyline 进行充气或放气，从而生成多边形。如果 delta 为正，则使折线向外增长。返回多边形数组，因为扩展/缩小可能会导致多个离散的多边形。如果 delta 为负，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: InterpolatedCamera is a Camera which smoothly moves to match a target node’s position and rotation.
trans-unit.target: InterpolatedCamera是一个Camera，可以平滑移动以匹配目标节点的位置和旋转。

trans-unit.source: Interpolates the transform to other Transform by weight amount (0-1).

trans-unit.source: Intersects polygon_a with polygon_b and returns an array of intersected polygons. This performs OPERATION_INTERSECTION between polygons. In other words, returns common area shared by polygons. Returns an empty array if no intersection occurs.
trans-unit.target: 将 polygon_a 与 polygon_b 相交，并返回相交多边形的数组。这将在多边形之间执行OPERATION_INTERSECTION。换句话说，返回多边形共享的公共区域。如果没有交集，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Intersects polyline with polygon and returns an array of intersected polylines. This performs OPERATION_INTERSECTION between the polyline and the polygon. This operation can be thought of as chopping a line with a closed shape.
trans-unit.target: 相交 polyline 与 polygon 并返回相交折线的阵列。这将在折线和多边形之间执行OPERATION_INTERSECTION。可以认为此操作是切成闭合形状的线。

trans-unit.source: Intersects a ray in a given space. The returned object is a dictionary with the following fields:

It features many built-in shortcuts which will always be available (Ctrl here maps to Command on macOS):

trans-unit.target: 也可以使用非欧几里得距离。为此，创建一个扩展 AStar 并覆盖_compute_cost和_estimate_cost方法的类。都采用两个索引并返回一个长度，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: It is greatly advised to enable low processor usage mode (see OS.low_processor_usage_mode) when using GraphEdits.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议在使用GraphEdits时启用低处理器使用率模式（请参阅OS.low_processor_usage_mode）。

trans-unit.source: It is greatly advised to enable low-processor usage mode (see OS.low_processor_usage_mode) when using GraphEdits.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议在使用GraphEdits时启用低处理器使用模式（请参阅OS.low_processor_usage_mode）。

trans-unit.source: It is notably used to provide AR modules with a video feed from the camera.
trans-unit.target: 值得注意的是,它用于为AR模块提供摄像头的视频信号。

trans-unit.source: It is only called if input processing is enabled, which is done automatically if this method is overridden, and can be toggled with set_process_input.
trans-unit.target: 仅在启用输入处理的情况下才调用它，如果覆盖了此方法，它将自动完成，并且可以使用set_process_input进行切换。

trans-unit.source: It is only called if physics processing is enabled, which is done automatically if this method is overridden, and can be toggled with set_physics_process.
trans-unit.target: 仅在启用了物理处理的情况下才调用它，如果重写了此方法，该处理将自动完成，并且可以使用set_physics_process进行切换。

trans-unit.source: It is only called if processing is enabled, which is done automatically if this method is overridden, and can be toggled with set_process.
trans-unit.target: 仅在启用处理的情况下才调用它，如果覆盖了此方法，它将自动完成，并且可以使用set_process进行切换。

trans-unit.source: It is only called if unhandled input processing is enabled, which is done automatically if this method is overridden, and can be toggled with set_process_unhandled_input.
trans-unit.target: 仅在启用了未处理的输入处理的情况下才调用它，如果重写了此方法，它将自动完成，并且可以使用set_process_unhandled_input进行切换。

trans-unit.source: It is only called if unhandled key input processing is enabled, which is done automatically if this method is overridden, and can be toggled with set_process_unhandled_key_input.
trans-unit.target: 仅在启用了未处理的键输入处理的情况下才调用此方法，如果覆盖了此方法，则将自动完成该处理，并且可以使用set_process_unhandled_key_input进行切换。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to override the MultiplayerAPI instance used by specific Nodes by setting the Node.custom_multiplayer property, effectively allowing to run both client and server in the same scene.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置Node.custom_multiplayer属性可以覆盖特定节点使用的MultiplayerAPI实例，从而有效地允许客户端和服务器在同一场景中运行。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to only use set_base if you know what you’re doing.
trans-unit.target: 如果您知道自己在做什么，建议仅使用set_base。

trans-unit.source: It is similar to Basis, which implements matrix representation of rotations, and can be parametrized using both an axis-angle pair or Euler angles. But due to its compactness and the way it is stored in memory, certain operations (obtaining axis-angle and performing SLERP, in particular) are more efficient and robust against floating point errors.
trans-unit.target: 它类似于Basis，它实现旋转的矩阵表示，并且可以使用轴角对或Euler角进行参数化。但是由于其紧凑性和将其存储在内存中的方式，某些操作（尤其是获取轴角度并执行SLERP）对于浮点错误更有效且更可靠。

trans-unit.source: It is similar to Basis, which implements matrix representation of rotations, and can be parametrized using both an axis-angle pair or Euler angles. Basis stores rotation, scale, and shearing, while Quat only stores rotation.
trans-unit.target: 它与Basis类似,Basis实现了旋转的矩阵表示,可以使用轴角对或欧拉角进行参数化。Basis存储旋转、比例和剪切,而Quat只存储旋转。

trans-unit.source: It is the position of this node that you update when your character needs to move through your game world while we’re not moving in the real world. Movement in the real world is always in relation to this origin point.
trans-unit.target: 当角色需要在游戏世界中移动而我们不在真实世界中移动时，您将更新此节点的位置。现实世界中的运动始终与该起点有关。

trans-unit.source: It is the position of this node that you update when your character needs to move through your game world while we're not moving in the real world. Movement in the real world is always in relation to this origin point.
trans-unit.target: 当我们在现实世界中不移动时,当你的角色需要在你的游戏世界中移动时,你更新的就是这个节点的位置。在现实世界中的移动总是与这个原点有关。

trans-unit.source: It is up to the code using this style box to decide what these contents are: for example, a Button respects this content margin for the textual contents of the button.
trans-unit.target: 取决于使用此样式框的代码来决定这些内容是什么：例如，一个按钮在按钮的文本内容中遵守此内容边距。

trans-unit.source: It is useful for making other nodes follow a path, without coding the movement pattern. For that, the nodes must be children of this node. The descendant nodes will then move accordingly when setting an offset in this node.
trans-unit.target: 它的作用是使其他节点遵循一条路径,而不对运动模式进行编码。为此,节点必须是这个节点的子节点。当在这个节点中设置偏移量时,子代节点就会相应地移动。

trans-unit.source: It is useful for making other nodes follow a path, without coding the movement pattern. For that, the nodes must be descendants of this node. Then, when setting an offset in this node, the descendant nodes will move accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 它的作用是使其他节点遵循一条路径,而不对运动模式进行编码。为此,这些节点必须是这个节点的子孙节点。那么,当在这个节点中设置一个偏移量时,子孙节点将相应地移动。

trans-unit.source: It is very important that vertex attributes are passed before the call to add_vertex, failure to do this will result in an error when committing the vertex information to a mesh.
trans-unit.target: 在调用add_vertex 之前传递顶点属性非常重要，否则，将顶点信息提交到网格时将导致错误。

trans-unit.source: It keeps a cache of precalculated points along the curve, to speed further calculations up.
trans-unit.target: 它保留了沿曲线的预计算点的缓存,以加快进一步的计算速度。

trans-unit.source: It keeps a cache of precalculated points along the curve, to speed up further calculations.

trans-unit.source: It takes Animations from an AnimationPlayer node and mixes them depending on the graph.
trans-unit.target: 它从AnimationPlayer节点获取Animation，然后根据图形对其进行混合。

trans-unit.source: It uses the many ResourceFormatLoader classes registered in the engine (either built-in or from a plugin) to load files into memory and convert them to a format that can be used by the engine.
trans-unit.target: 它使用引擎中注册的许多ResourceFormatLoader类（内置的或从插件的）将文件加载到内存中，并将它们转换为引擎可以使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: It uses the many ResourceFormatSaver classes registered in the engine (either built-in or from a plugin) to save engine-specific resource data to text-based (e.g. .tres or .tscn) or binary files (e.g. .res or .scn).
trans-unit.target: 它使用引擎中注册的许多ResourceFormatSaver类（内置的或从插件的）将引擎特定的资源数据保存到基于文本的（例如 .tres 或 .tscn ）或二进制文件（例如 .res 或 .scn ）。 。

trans-unit.source: It’s best to set this to 1.0 when starting out.
trans-unit.target: 刚开始时最好将其设置为1.0。

trans-unit.target: 它的速度比INTERPOLATE_BILINEAR慢，但产生的结果质量更高，而混淆现象更少。

trans-unit.source: Item text only supports single-line strings, newline characters (e.g. \n) in the string won't produce a newline. Text wrapping is enabled in ICON_MODE_TOP mode, but column's width is adjusted to fully fit its content by default. You need to set fixed_column_width greater than zero to wrap the text.
trans-unit.target: 项目文本仅支持单行字符串，字符串中的换行符（例如 \n ）不会产生换行符。默认情况下，在ICON_MODE_TOP模式下启用了文本换行，但是调整了列的宽度以完全适合其内容。您需要将fixed_column_width设置为大于零以包装文本。

trans-unit.source: Kinematic bodies are special types of bodies that are meant to be user-controlled. They are not affected by physics at all; to other types of bodies, such as a character or a rigid body, these are the same as a static body. However, they have two main uses:
trans-unit.target: 运动体是一种特殊类型的身体,旨在由用户控制。它们完全不受物理学的影响;对于其他类型的机构,如角色或刚体,它们与静态机构是一样的。然而,它们有两个主要用途。

trans-unit.source: Label displays plain text on the screen. It gives you control over the horizontal and vertical alignment, and can wrap the text inside the node’s bounding rectangle. It doesn’t support bold, italics or other formatting. For that, use RichTextLabel instead.
